oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Senator Stewart speaking to a group of people
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man stands and speaks to a group of people seated at tables.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Interiors; Ridge Hall; Young Democrats Club
Hicks,Van B.; Hodge, Allan V.; Stewart, Arthur Thomas (Tom), 1892-1972; Stewart, Woody
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Senator Stewart is standing. Woody Stewart is seated on the left of the senator. The man on right of Senator Stewart is Allan V. Hodge and the last man on the right is Van B. Hicks. See image MTG 0060.
